description:
If you are just getting into coaching/consulting this is perfect for you. Regardless of your current experience, you will be able to attract your first paying client or customer.

Working directly with clients can lead to a high income with a lot of personal freedom. This course will work for you, whether you just want to start a home based business or want to build a big company.

It all starts with your first client. So let's make it happen!
title: Coaching Business Secrets: Get Coaching Clients
